testcase.name: Login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user enters email "invalidEmail" and password "wrongPassword"..........passed And clicks on Login button..................................................passed Then error message should be displayed......................................passed

testcase.name: Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user enters email "validEmail" and password "validPassword"............passed And clicks on Login button..................................................passed Then user should be logged in successfully..................................passed
